metadata.description: Lia, a 17-year old orphan living by the Atlantic is swept away by the ocean currents during a ruthless storm.  She is then saved by Moria and Albert, a duo of illegal runaways on their magical ship!  Her normal, mundane life suddenly becomes a supernatural adventure as she learns about the powers of their kind and their relations to the human world. But Lia soon discovers that there is a dark secret hidden in a mysterious kingdom.  Join Lia as she unlocks the truth behind an Ocean of Secrets...
metadata.name: Ocean of Secrets
